homepage.heroDescription: Professional pulmonological care, diagnosis and treatment of respiratory and lung diseases.
homepage.welcomeDescription: Welcome to our specialized pulmonological care website. We offer comprehensive services in the field of diagnosis and treatment of respiratory diseases.
homepage.diagnosticsDescription: Modern diagnostic methods for lung and respiratory diseases using the latest technologies.
homepage.treatmentDescription: Individual approach to treatment for each patient with emphasis on comprehensive care.
homepage.preventionDescription: Counseling and preventive measures for maintaining respiratory health.
homepage.footerTagline: Specialized Pulmonological Care • Diagnostics • Treatment • Prevention

clinic.title: Our Clinic
clinic.subtitle: Modern Pulmonological Center
clinic.description: Our clinic provides top-quality pulmonological care using the latest technologies and an individual approach to each patient.
clinic.facilitiesDescription: We have the most modern diagnostic and therapeutic equipment for comprehensive care of patients with respiratory diseases.
clinic.teamDescription: A team of experienced specialists with many years of experience in pneumology and allergology.
clinic.qualityCareDescription: We combine modern technology with a human approach to achieve the best treatment results.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive Pulmonological Care
services.description: We offer a wide range of services in the field of diagnosis and treatment of respiratory and lung diseases.
services.consultationDescription: Comprehensive examination and diagnosis of lung diseases.
services.allergologyDescription: Diagnosis and treatment of allergic respiratory diseases.

ourTeam.title: Our Team
ourTeam.subtitle: Experienced Specialists
ourTeam.description: Our team consists of experienced doctors and nurses specializing in pulmonology and allergology.
ourTeam.experienceDescription: Many years of experience in the field and continuous education guarantee quality care.
ourTeam.approachDescription: We give maximum attention and care to each patient.
ourTeam.teamIntroductionDescription: Detailed information about our team of specialists will be available soon. You can contact us directly for more information about our doctors and their specializations.
ourTeam.doctorBio: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.
ourTeam.nurseBio: Experienced nurse specializing in pulmonological care for patients with respiratory diseases.
ourTeam.adminBio: Responsible for administrative operations of the clinic and coordination of patient care.
ourTeam.missionDescription: We provide the highest quality care in the field of pulmonology and allergology with an emphasis on individual approach to each patient. Our team is here for you.

news.title: News
news.subtitle: Latest Information
news.description: Follow the latest information from the field of pulmonology and news from our clinic.
news.comingSoonDescription: The news section is in preparation. You will soon find the latest information and news from the field here.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Contact Information
contact.description: Call us or visit us at our clinic. We will be happy to provide you with more information about our services.
contact.contactUsDescription: Do not hesitate to contact us. We will be happy to answer all your questions and provide more information about our services.
contact.mapSubtitle: Our clinics are strategically located for easy access by all patients.
contact.mapDescription: Interactive Google Maps will be integrated here showing both clinic locations.
contact.mapIntegration: Google Maps will be integrated here

photogallery.title: Photo Gallery
photogallery.subtitle: Take a look at our facilities
photogallery.description: Get acquainted with our clinic environment and modern equipment used for diagnosis and treatment.
photogallery.comingSoonDescription: The photo gallery is in preparation. You will soon find photos of our facilities and equipment here.
photogallery.visitDescription: Contact us and arrange a visit. We will be happy to show you our facilities and introduce our services.

meta.description: Professional pulmonological care, diagnosis and treatment of respiratory and lung diseases.
